ComicInfo.Summary: Death Metal: An Anti-Crisis - Part III - Pick Up Styx: Wonder Woman, Batman, Harley Quinn, and Swamp Thing travel to Apokolips to free Superman, who is being held captive by Darkfather, a Darkseid version of Batman. Meanwhile, Robin King appears before the Justice Society, Barry, and Wally to herald the arrival of the Darkest Knight, the new lifeform that the Batman Who Laughs has evolved into. The Darkest Knight plans to steal the powers of the Multiverse from Wally, prompting Barry, Wally, and Jay to try to outrun the Darkest Knight. Elsewhere, Lobo continues on a mysterious mission.
ComicInfo.Title: Death Metal: An Anti-Crisis - Part III - Pick Up Styx
